mapper.select: select partner_store.sname sname, partner_store.saddress saddress, partner_store.businessHours businessHours, partner_store.telephone telephone, partner_store_menu.* from partner_store inner join partner_store_menu on partner_store.sno = partner_store_menu.sno where partner_store_menu.status = 'O' and partner_store_menu.sno = #{sno}

select partner_store.sname sname, partner_store_menu.sno sno, partner_store_menu.mno mno, partner_store_menu.mname mname, partner_store_menu.mprice mprice from partner_store inner join partner_store_menu on partner_store.sno = partner_store_menu.sno where partner_store_menu.status = 'O' and partner_store_menu.sno = #{sno}
